capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and had a significant impact on the students' education, but at the same time, his behavior towards Harry Potter and others was often quite... intimidating. He seemed to have a personal vendetta against Harry, which made it difficult for me to see him as just another teacher. I think his past experiences and relationships played a big role in shaping his views on Hogwarts and its students.
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. so, valeria mentioned that snape is affiliated with hogwarts.
